content: You finally walked out. The sunshine sprinkled in front of you, and a soft wind breezes on your face.  You took a deep breath, leaving all your previous fears behind.
The natural fragrance of peaches and grass filled your nostrils as you walked into the woods.
Juicy peaches hanging on branches, you can pick one easily.

chooseItem.text: Do not pick, go straight through the peach forest
